jcr:content.jcr:description: Make room for a better trail run in Altra’s legendary Lone Peak 5. With Altra EGO™ midsole foam and signature FootShape™ comfort, you can take on any terrain.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Lone Peak 5

video.description: Woman running around town in the Altra Rivera
video.name: Altra Running Rivera

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
THE LONE PEAK 5
WITH ALTRA EGO™ FOAM

image.alt: Make room for a better run.

customhtml2.customHTML:
ALTRA EGO™ MIDSOLE
FOR ADDED COMFORT

For the first time, Altra EGO™ midsole foam meets the Lone Peak line, bringing responsiveness to every step you take, so any road, any trail, any terrain—the Lone Peak 5 is ready.

CONQUER EVERY TRAIL

Thanks to the TrailClaw™ and MaxTrac™ outsole, the Lone Peak 5 is one of our grippiest trail shoes to date. Our outsoles are optimized for rugged, unpredicatable surfaces, so even the toughest terrain doesn't stand a chance.

THE LONE PEAK LEGACY

The iconic trail runner has come a long way since its debut 10 years ago. And the latest evolution of the classic shoe has all the features you love, plus more durability for an overall better ride.

ALTRA FOOTSHAPE™ COMFORT

Our signature FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet.

image.alt: Women's Rivera Teal Green Top Shot
